moves.1. d4: This is an open annotation,I mean that I wrote only few comments,but I'd like to know the opinions of readers about it.I feel that I played it not badly until a certain point,then began to make mistakes,and lose the positional advantage that had.
moves.1... Nf6 2. c4 e6 3. Nc3 Bb4 4. e3 O-O 5: Tried to develop and protect the important f knight
moves.13. Bd2 Bb7: I'm decided to capture the Knight in f3,if he will not protect it in other way but the g pawn
moves.14. Rfc1: I think it has been a mistake,since the position after Bxf3 would be not nice for white
moves.15... a5 16. e4 Qb7 17. Qd3 Rfd8 18. Qe2: here I think I made a mistake,but am not sure...
too hasty...didn't think at his next move,so obvious...but it was a real time game,and I'm not used at this way to play...
moves.24. f3 Rd6 25. Bc7 Rh6: what I thought to do?Why I gave another piece?
moves.26. fxg4 Qg5: here my situation begin to get worse more and more
